detectors.description:
ERC20.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20__23.sol#128-133) uses literals with too many digits:
	- mint(_msgSender(),1000000000 * 10 ** 6) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20__23.sol#132)
detectors.markdown:
[ERC20.constructor()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20__23.sol#L128-L133) uses literals with too many digits:
	- [mint(_msgSender(),1000000000 * 10 ** 6)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20__23.sol#L132)
